rdf:Property.rdfs:label: finishes
заканчивает
beendet
termine
περατώνει
finaliza
结束了
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property allows the ending point for a E2 Temporal Entity to be situated by reference to the ending point of another temporal entity of longer duration. This property is only necessary if the time span is unknown (otherwise the relationship can be calculated). This property is the same as the "finishes / finished-by" relationships of Allen’s temporal logic (Allen, 1983, pp. 832-843).
